title: Holiday Magic
description: It's the White Oak Holiday Food Festival, and Mary-Kate and Ashley are creating their own restaurant called Sugar and Spice as part of a school competition. But when the important alumni arrive for dinner, Ashley still can't remember grandma's secret ingredient for the main course, Mary-Kate is overrun with chickens, and the pine cone garlands are dripping into the soup. Help!
author: Diana G. Gallagher
